properties.title: Turbine and Turbine-related talks at ApacheCon EU 2005

section.name: ApacheCon EU 2005 Talks
section.p:
These talks at ApacheCon EU 2005 might be of special interest for Turbine developers:
Henning P. Schmiedehausen - T09: Rapid application development with Maven and Turbine
Henning P. Schmiedehausen - WE10: Jakarta Velocity - An Overview. Turbine uses Velocity as its primary View layer.
Carsten Ziegeler - FR02: (A) Maven is your friend. Turbine uses Maven as its build tool and the META plugin is based on Maven.
We are looking forward to meet you at ApacheCon EU 2005 in Stuttgart, Germany!
